PrecisAppointment of KPMG, CHARTERED ACCOUNTANTS, of Toronto, Ontario, as auditor of the Canada Post Corporation for the year 2006; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of the Canada Post Corporation for the year 2006.
